name: alibaba.einvoice.paper.invalid
description: 作废一张已开具的纸票，开票日期在当月，产生逆向时作废即可，开票日期跨月则冲红蓝票

requestParams.name: invoice_code
requestParams.description: 发票代码，空白作废时必填

requestParams.name: invoice_no
requestParams.description: 发票号码，空白作废时必填

requestParams.name: invalid_type
requestParams.description: 作废类型, 0=空白发票(有残缺 的纸张发票，不能做为有效报销)作废, 1=已开发票作废

responseParams.name: is_success
responseParams.description: 接口调用是否成功，操作结果tmc异步返回alibaba_invoice_PaperOpsReturn
